QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Help prevent hospital errors
QAPair.Answer: A hospital error is when there is a mistake in your medical care. Errors can be made in your: Medicines, Surgery, Diagnosis, Equipment, Lab and other test reports , Hospital errors are a leading cause of death. Doctors, nurses, and all hospital personnel are working to make hospital care safer. Learn what you can do to help prevent medical errors when you are in the hospital.
